t: Q: One of the mugs inner lid seems to be stuck how can I fill it
s: The lid is in 2 parts, the top and and one with the seal on . Sounds like you have taken the top lid off . Try unscrewing the inner lid anti clockwise .

t: My lid won't stay on! I've tried reaching out to customer ...
s: I had this same issue when I tried using my tumbler the first time after washing it. The seal on the lid might be on incorrectly. Make sure the seal is with the seam side not showing (or in.) I had replaced the seal the wrong way.

t: Q: The lid is stuck and won't come off
s: Every one of the lids on my "twist on" Starbucks tumblers gets stuck. I empty them out through the straw hole, stick it in the freezer for 2-3 minutes and the lid twists right off. Heat will make it expand and tighten the lid.

t: Is the lid suppose to fit tight on the rice cooker, mine seems ...
s: The lid and bowl needs to fit and is in same shape. As reg how tight is the fitting , it is not needed to be as tight as a sucking cup but it has to fit with no gaps along the rim.
